name: CrazyTalk Animator Actor Fitting File
summary: Learn about .CTBODYFITTING files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CrazyTalk Animator was renamed as Cartoon Animator and no longer supports CTBODYFITTING files.

description: File created by CrazyTalk Animator, a 2D animation and cartoon program; saves an actor whose head and body shape, control points, and mask information have been profiled by the software; created using the Actor Creator and Face Creator components.
